message.content: To determine the correct answer, we need to think about actions that generate heat. Option (A) looking out of a window does not generate any heat. Option (B) putting the radio on may provide some ambient heat if the radio is producing heat, but it does not generate warmth directly. Option (C) looking at a snowstorm does not generate any heat. Option (D) smashing hands together repeatedly generates friction, which can produce warmth. Therefore, option (D) is the correct answer.
